TEXT.TITLE: FIVE DIRECTORS OF TERRAPET ENERGY RESIGN
TEXT.BODY: <Terrapet Energy Corp> said five directors resigned because they could not obtain directors and officers liability insurance. It said the directors are Dean R. Fellows, Frederick B. Hegi Jr, W.D. Masterson, Thomas Sturgess and John C. Thomas. Reuter
